page.title: 07CHILDREN'S TOYS - GIRLS.
page.content: I am 4. My favourite toy is a{plastic {cookery set.} It has a teapot, saucepan, cooker and frying pan. I am 5. I play with a{toy pony}that has a coloured mane and tail. I am 6. I like a fluffy{clockwork {monkey}that plays "Rock a bye baby". I am 7. My favourite toy is a life like new-born{baby doll. I am 8 and I like playing with a {Sindy doll}which you can dress up. She is like a human because she has lots of things that humans have. I am 9. I like a{baby-crawl-away}that runs off batteries and wiggles her bottom as she moves along. I'm 10. My favourite toy is a dapple grey{rocking horse}on an oak base. I am 11 and my best toy is a{teddy {bear}called Hug Me. I take him to bed with me because he's lovely.
